forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers this afternoon following a period of morning rain and wind. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers this afternoon following a period of morning rain and wind. High around 50F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
